|| *Syntax* || Player.GetAverageSquadLevel() ||
|| *Return* || Integer ||

|| *Part of Library* || Table part ||
|| *Type* || Serverside, Clientside or Shared ||
|| *File* || core/sharedfiles/sh_squads.lua ||

==Additional Notes==
